// <auto-generated/>
using System;
using System.Buffers.Binary;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Runtime.CompilerServices;
using System.Text;
using FourSer.Contracts;
using System.IO;
using FourSer.Gen.Helpers;

namespace FourSer.Tests.GeneratorTestCases.SimpleCollectionNoAttribute;

public partial class MyPacket : ISerializable<MyPacket>
{
    public static int GetPacketSize(MyPacket obj)
    {
        var size = 0;
        size += sizeof(int); // Count size for Data
        size += obj.Data.Count * sizeof(byte);
        return size;
    }

    public static MyPacket Deserialize(System.ReadOnlySpan<byte> data, out int bytesRead)
    {
        bytesRead = 0;
        var originalData = data;
        var obj = new MyPacket();
        var DataCount = RoSpanReaderHelpers.ReadInt32(ref data);
        obj.Data = RoSpanReaderHelpers.ReadBytes(ref data, DataCount).ToList();
        bytesRead = originalData.Length - data.Length;
        return obj;
    }

    public static int Serialize(MyPacket obj, System.Span<byte> data)
    {
        var originalData = data;
        SpanWriterHelpers.WriteInt32(ref data, (int)obj.Data.Count);
        SpanWriterHelpers.WriteBytes(ref data, obj.Data);
        return originalData.Length - data.Length;
    }
}
